1: <pb/>Xquetamaj c'u ri takomxenlab xukuje' ri kachalal ri e c'o pa Judey chi xukuje' ri man aj judeyib taj qui cojom ri u tzij ri Dios.
2: <pb/>Aretak c'u xtzelej ri Lu' pa Jerusalen, xepe jujun cojonelab ri aj judeyib xquic'ulelaj.
3: <pb/>Xquibij che: “¿Jasche xatbe che qui solixic ri man aj judeyib taj, xat wa' c'u ne cuc'?”
4: <pb/>Ri Lu' xuchaplej c'u u bixic pa u cholajil ronojel ri xc'ulmaxic. Xubij:
5: <pb/>“Aretak in c'o pa Jop, cätajin quinban ch'awem ruc' Dios, xinwil jun c'utwächinic: xinwil jun jasach ri cajunamataj ruc' jun nimalaj sak atz'iak ri ximital ri quiejeb u tza'm cätajin cakaj ulok chicaj, xkaj ulok chnuwäch.
6: <pb/>Aretak kas xinca'y che, xebenwil awaj cajcaj cakan e c'o chupam, xukuje' juyubal tak awaj. Xukuje' e c'o awaj ri cäquijuruj quib, xukuje' chicop ri e c'o qui xic'.
7: <pb/>Xinta' c'u jun ch'abal ri xubij chwe: ‘Chatwalijok, Lu'. Chatpilonok, chatwok c'ut.’
8: <pb/>Xinbij c'ut: ‘Jayi', Wajaw. Man c'o ta jumul oquinak ta jun jasach pa nu chi' ri tz'il mawi ri man josk'im taj.’
9: <pb/>Ri ch'abal ri xpe chicaj xinuch'abej chucamul, xubij chwe: ‘Ri xjosk'ix rumal ri Dios, mabij tz'il che.’
10: <pb/>Oxmul xban wa'. Ronojel c'ut xjic' chi bic chicaj.
11: <pb/>Chanim c'ut xetaq'ui' oxib achijab chuchi' ri uchi'be ri in c'o wi. Ri e takom ulok pa Sesarey che nu siq'uixic.
12: <pb/>Ri Uxlabaxel xubij chwe chi quebenwachilaj bic, chi muban quieb nu c'u'x. Xukuje' xincachilaj bic we wakib kachalal ri', xujoc c'u bic pa rachoch jun achi.
13: <pb/>Ri are' xuya' u bixic chke chi xril jun tako'n aj caj ri xtaq'ui' ruc', xubij che: ‘Chattakan bic pa Jop che u siq'uixic jun achi Simon u bi' ri cäbix Lu' che.
14: <pb/>Are c'u cabin na chawe jas ri cabano catcolotajic, xukuje' conojel ri e awachalaxic.’
15: <pb/>Aretak xinchaplej qui tzijobexic, xkaj ulok ri Ruxlabal ri Dios paquiwi', je jas xuban chque uj pa ri tictajic.
16: <pb/>Xnataj c'u chwe ri u bim ulok ri Ajawaxel: “Ri Xuan xuban ri bautism pa ri ja', are' c'u ri ix quixcoji' na pa ri Ruxlabal ri Dios.
17: <pb/>We c'u ri Dios xa' junam xusipaj chque jas ri xusipaj chke uj, ri uj cojoninak che ri Kajaw Jesucrist, ¿jachin ta c'u lo ri' ri in, ri quincuin ta che u k'atixic ri Dios?”
18: <pb/>Aretak ri kachalal xequita' we jastak ri', man xech'aw ta chic, xquinimarisaj u k'ij ri Dios, xquibij: “¡Xukuje' ri Dios u yo'm chque ri man aj judeyib taj chi cäquiq'uex qui c'u'x rech cäc'oji' junalic qui c'aslemal!”
19: <pb/>Ri cojonelab ri qui jabum quib rumal rech ri c'ax ri xpe chquij aretak xcämisax ri Estebn, xeboc'ow pa tak e q'ui tinimit. Xebopan c'ä pa Penis, pa Chipr, xukuje' pa Antioquiy. Xak xuwi c'u chque ri aj judeyib xquitzijoj wi ri tzij; man xquibij ta chque ri niq'uiaj winak chic.
20: <pb/>E c'o c'u jujun chque, e cojonelab wa' aj Chipr xukuje' aj Siren, aretak xebopan pa Antioquiy, xukuje' xequich'abej ri man aj judeyib taj, xquitzijoj ri utzalaj tak tzij re ri Ajawaxel Jesus chque.
21: <pb/>Ri u k'ab ri Ajawaxel c'o cuc'. E q'ui xecojonic, xequiya' can ri ojer tak qui cojonic, xecojon che ri Ajawaxel.
22: <pb/>Xtataj u tzijol wa' cumal ri cojonelab re ri comon cojonelab ri c'o pa Jerusalen, xquitak c'u bic ri Bernabe rech cäbe pa Antioquiy.
23: <pb/>Aretak xopanic, xrilo chi c'o ri u tok'ob ri Dios cuc' ri cojonelab chila', xquicotic. Xebupixbej conojel chi cäquiterenej ri Ajawaxel ruc' ronojel canima', chi jic chetaken che ri Ajawaxel.
24: <pb/>Ri Bernabe are utzalaj achi, nojinak che ri Ruxlabal ri Dios, xukuje' pa ri u cojonic, xukuje' q'ui winak xecojon che ri Ajawaxel.
25: <pb/>Xbe c'u ri Bernabe pa Tars che u tzucuxic ri Sawl.
26: <pb/>Aretak xurik ri Sawl, xuc'am ulok pa Antioquiy. Xec'oji' cuc' ri comon cojonelab chila' ronojel ri jun junab, e q'ui winak xequitijoj. Pa Antioquiy c'ut ri xebinax wi nabe mul ajcristib chque ri e cojonelab.
27: <pb/>Pa tak ri k'ijol ri' xebel ulok jujun k'axal tzij pa Jerusalen, xebopan pa Antioquiy.
28: <pb/>Jun chque wa' are Agab u bi', ri are' xtaq'ui'c, xuk'alajisaj rumal ri Uxlabaxel chi cäpe na jun nimalaj wi'jal cho ronojel ri uwächulew. Xpe c'u wa' pa tak ri k'ij aretak ri Clawd are k'atal tzij.
29: <pb/>Ri cojonelab c'ut ri e c'o pa Antioquiy xquichomaj u takic bic jun to'banic chque ri kachalal ri e c'o pa Judey, jas ri quecuin che u ya'ic.
30: <pb/>Je c'u xquibano, xquitak c'u bic jun to'banic pa u k'ab ri Bernabe xukuje' ri Sawl rech quequiya' chque tak ri tatayib ri quetakan pa ri comon cojonelab pa Judey.
